title: IPHB Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Lecturer Post
description: The Institute of Psychiatry and Human Behaviour (IPHB) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Lecturer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD can grab this chance and apply for the IPHB Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are looki...
